snippet.title: SUNSOFT is Back! Retro Game Selection - Trailer
snippet.description: SUNSOFT is back and it’s bringing some of its 8-bit classics to the West for the very first time! In SUNSOFT is Back! Retro Game Selection, discover three of the legendary Japanese publisher’s Famicom games and play them in English for the first time ever! The three games included are: The Wing of Madoola, Firework Thrower Kantaro’s 53 Stations of the Tokaido and Ripple Island. Content creators who enjoy retro games, challenging titles as well as Adventure games will have a lot of fun with this compilation.
